about.title: About me
about.description: I am a Front-End Web Developer born and raised in Cairo, Egypt. I graduated from Cairo University and have a serious passion for UI interactions, animations and creating intuitive and dynamic user experiences. I am a well-organised person, problem solver and cooperative person with high attention to detail. Fan of English literature and online gaming.
